trans-unit.source: View alerts from Operations Manager
trans-unit.target: View alerts from Operations Manager

trans-unit.source: Learn about managing alerts from Operations Manager for monitored servers in your infrastructure
trans-unit.target: Learn about managing alerts from Operations Manager for monitored servers in your infrastructure

trans-unit.source: View Operations Manager alerts
trans-unit.target: View Operations Manager alerts

trans-unit.source: Before you can use Alert Management in Microsoft Azure Operational Insights, you must have the solution installed.
trans-unit.target: Before you can use Alert Management in Microsoft Azure Operational Insights, you must have the solution installed.

trans-unit.source: To read more about installing solutions, see [Setup your workspace](operational-insights-setup-workspace.md).
trans-unit.target: To read more about installing solutions, see [Setup your workspace](operational-insights-setup-workspace.md).

trans-unit.source: The solution only works when your servers are monitored by to Operations Manager agents.
trans-unit.target: The solution only works when your servers are monitored by to Operations Manager agents.

trans-unit.source: See [Connect to Operational Insights from System Center Operations Manager](operational-insights-connect-scom.md) for information about using Operations Manager with Operational Insights.
trans-unit.target: See [Connect to Operational Insights from System Center Operations Manager](operational-insights-connect-scom.md) for information about using Operations Manager with Operational Insights.

trans-unit.source: After the solution is installed, you can view alerts for your monitored servers by using the **Alert Management** tile on the **Overview** dashboard in Operational Insights.
trans-unit.target: After the solution is installed, you can view alerts for your monitored servers by using the **Alert Management** tile on the **Overview** dashboard in Operational Insights.

trans-unit.source: image of Alert Management tile
trans-unit.target: image of Alert Management tile

trans-unit.source: You can view and manage Microsoft Azure Operational Insights alerts from the **Alerts** dashboard.
trans-unit.target: You can view and manage Microsoft Azure Operational Insights alerts from the **Alerts** dashboard.

trans-unit.source: On the dashboard, alert information is displayed in the following categories:
trans-unit.target: On the dashboard, alert information is displayed in the following categories:

trans-unit.source: Active Alerts
trans-unit.target: Active Alerts

trans-unit.source: Critical Alerts
trans-unit.target: Critical Alerts

trans-unit.source: Warning Alerts
trans-unit.target: Warning Alerts

trans-unit.source: Alert Sources
trans-unit.target: Alert Sources

trans-unit.source: All Active Alerts
trans-unit.target: All Active Alerts

trans-unit.source: Shows the percentage of alerts that are critical, warnings, and informational.
trans-unit.target: Shows the percentage of alerts that are critical, warnings, and informational.

trans-unit.source: Common Alert Queries
trans-unit.target: Common Alert Queries

trans-unit.source: This area contains pre-built queries that the Operational Insights software development team has created to help you get started using alerts.
trans-unit.target: This area contains pre-built queries that the Operational Insights software development team has created to help you get started using alerts.

trans-unit.source: Alerts tell you that an issue was detected, which server the alert affects, the priority, and the name of the alert.
trans-unit.target: Alerts tell you that an issue was detected, which server the alert affects, the priority, and the name of the alert.

trans-unit.source: image of Alert dashboard
trans-unit.target: image of Alert dashboard

trans-unit.source: image of Alert dashboard
trans-unit.target: image of Alert dashboard

trans-unit.source: On the **Alert Management** dashboard, you can view all the alerts that Microsoft Azure Operational Insights has found.
trans-unit.target: On the **Alert Management** dashboard, you can view all the alerts that Microsoft Azure Operational Insights has found.

trans-unit.source: To view Operational Insights alerts
trans-unit.target: To view Operational Insights alerts

trans-unit.source: On the **Overview** page, click the **Alert Management** tile.
trans-unit.target: On the **Overview** page, click the **Alert Management** tile.

trans-unit.source: On the **Alert Management** dashboard, view the alert categories and choose one to work with.
trans-unit.target: On the **Alert Management** dashboard, view the alert categories and choose one to work with.

trans-unit.source: Click a tile or any item to view detailed information about it in the **Search** page.
trans-unit.target: Click a tile or any item to view detailed information about it in the **Search** page.

trans-unit.source: By using the information you've found, you can investigate the alert and determine additional actions you might need to take to resolve it.
trans-unit.target: By using the information you've found, you can investigate the alert and determine additional actions you might need to take to resolve it.
